ltex.ignoreRuleInSentence.sentence: ^\QCapital budgeting decisions decisions as to what types of assets should be purchased to help generate future cash flows.\E$
^\QDividend policy decisions decisions concerning how much of current earnings to pay out as dividends rather than retain for reinvestment in the firm.\E$
^\Q15th century modern accounting was born with Benetto Cotrugli (double entry bookkeeping system)\E$
